summary: Mobile UX/UI Hardening Phase Testing Complete. All responsive table-to-card conversions verified. Desktop (≥1024px) remains 100% unchanged with tables. Mobile (≤1023px) shows cards with bottom navigation. Dialogs are fullscreen on mobile.

1_admin_desktop_sidebar.details: Desktop (1920x800): Sidebar visible with navigation. No bottom nav rendered.

2_admin_desktop_users_table.details: Desktop: Users page shows table with columns (Usuario, Email, Rol, Estado, Creado, Acciones). 10 user rows displayed.

3_admin_desktop_audit_table.details: Desktop: Audit page shows table with columns (Timestamp, Evento, Módulo, Usuario, IP, Detalles).

4_admin_mobile_bottom_nav.details: Mobile (390x844): Bottom nav visible with 5 items (Dashboard, Usuarios, RRHH, Reservas, Perfil). All items clickable.

5_admin_mobile_users_cards.details: Mobile: Users page shows 10 user cards instead of table. Table is hidden (visible: false). Cards show name, email, role, status, creation date.

6_admin_mobile_audit_cards.details: Mobile: Audit page shows 500 audit cards. Table is hidden. Mobile container visible.

7_admin_mobile_payments_cards.details: Mobile: Payments page shows mobile-friendly layout with cards for payment history.

8_superadmin_desktop_tables.details: Desktop: Condominiums tab shows table with columns (Condominio, Estado, Usuarios, MRR, Acciones). Users tab shows table with columns (Usuario, Condominio, Rol, Estado, Acciones).

9_superadmin_mobile_bottom_nav.details: Mobile: Super Admin bottom nav visible with 5 items (Dashboard, Condos, Contenido, Usuarios, Perfil). Yellow/orange theme.

10_superadmin_mobile_condos_cards.details: Mobile: Condominiums tab shows 3 condo cards. Table is hidden. Cards show name, email, status, usuarios count, MRR.

11_superadmin_mobile_users_cards.details: Mobile: Users tab shows 23 user cards. Table is hidden. Cards show name, email, condominio, rol, status.

12_dialog_fullscreen_mobile.details: Mobile: Create User dialog opens as fullscreen sheet (390x844, position 0,0). Desktop shows centered modal.

13_no_horizontal_scroll.details: Mobile: No horizontal scrolling detected on any page. Scroll width equals client width (390px).

14_breakpoint_verification.details: Breakpoint at 1024px (lg) correctly separates mobile (≤1023px) from desktop (≥1024px). CSS classes lg:hidden and lg:block work correctly.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile UX/UI hardening complete. All tables convert to cards on mobile (≤1023px). Desktop (≥1024px) unchanged with tables. Bottom navigation works for Admin (5 items) and Super Admin (5 items with yellow theme). Dialogs are fullscreen on mobile. No horizontal scrolling issues.

UserManagementPage.desktop: Table with columns (Usuario, Email, Rol, Estado, Creado, Acciones)

AuditModule.desktop: Table with columns (Timestamp, Evento, Módulo, Usuario, IP, Detalles)
AuditModule.mobile: MobileCard components with audit log details

SuperAdminDashboard_CondominiumsTab.desktop: Table with columns (Condominio, Estado, Usuarios, MRR, Acciones)

SuperAdminDashboard_UsersTab.desktop: Table with columns (Usuario, Condominio, Rol, Estado, Acciones)

breakpoint_verification.mobile_max: ≤1023px - Mobile layout with bottom nav and cards
breakpoint_verification.desktop_min: ≥1024px - Desktop layout with sidebar/tabs and tables
